item.title: Spectrum Global Solutions Inc 10-K
item.description: Spectrum Global Solutions Inc, which is in the Telephone Communications (No Radio Telephone) [4813] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 01, 2021 had 44800 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
